Classes

History of Labor Movements

Course Code: HIST 2201

This course provides an in-depth look at the origins and development of labor movements, with a focus on their social and political impact across different regions.

Social Justice and Activism

Course Code: HIST 3305

A study of the key social justice movements throughout history and their effects on modern political systems. The course covers a variety of topics including labor rights, gender equality, and civil rights.

Women in the Workforce

Course Code: HIST 4210

An exploration of the role of women in the workforce from the industrial revolution to the present day. The course will highlight key figures, movements, and policies that shaped women's labor rights.
